name: Pximg Proxy
description: A reverse proxy service for i.pximg.net

PROTOCOL.description: Specify the protocol of example URLs on index page. It may be useful when you are using a HTTPS CDN.

JSONSTORAGE.description: JsonStorage (https://jsonstorage.net/) ID. It will be used to store analytics data. You can get one by running `npm run create:jsonstorage` on local.
